title: RioT please help e get my account.
body: Its like i dont exist anymore. I want my account ack i am begging you. Cant you guys see me here. RIORYT!!!!!!

replies.body: It looks like someone might have gained access to your account somehow, and I strongly suggest you reach out to us in the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as you can. Our agents there will be able to get control of your account back in your hands as well as reverse any damage they might have done!
